attributes.action: confirmation of holiday dates/flights that will definitely not go ahead
attributes.additional_details:
Alot of families are due to pay remaining outstanding holiday balances for forthcoming holidays.
Travel companies /air are continuing to 'force' customers into paying these monies even tho its looking extremely likely they won't be goin ahead this summer.
I myself don't want to pay anymore monies if not going to be allowed on hol and cannot afford to wait for a refund /voucher.
Jet2 for eg are stopping up to June 17th but this does not help customers with later hols /payment to be paid for July.
Can the government give a wider date of holiday cancellations please to avoid any further stress or financial loss for the public
attributes.background: We need government guidance with forthcoming holiday dates /flights. Specifying what months will definitely not be advised or allowed to go ahead.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on holiday operations are a matter for individual operators, based on the most recent Government advice. 

You could start a petition calling on the Government to allow allow overseas travel to start on a specific date, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
